revised_title: The Fate of the Blastopore in Triton cristatus
tldr: The author investigates the fate of the blastopore in newt embryos (Triton cristatus) and finds that it does not form a neurenteric canal. Instead, the blastopore remains open and eventually becomes the anus. The study provides insights into the development and morphogenesis of vertebrates.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Developmental Biology
